Wisdom: الطُّمَأْنِينَةُ إِلَى كُلِّ أَحَدٍ قَبْلَ الِاخْتِبَارِ مِنْ قُصُورِ الْعَقْلِ
enWisdom: Being at ease with every person before gauging [them] is from lack of intellect

Wisdom: قَدِّمِ الِاخْتِبَارَ وَأَجِدِ الِاسْتِظْهَارَ فِي اخْتِيَارِ الْإِخْوَانِ وَإِ  لَّا أَلْجَأَكَ الِاضْطِرَارُ إِلَى مُقَارَنَةِ الْأَشْرَارِ
enWisdom: Before choosing a friend, assess him and try hard to find out about him, otherwise you will be forced by necessity to associate with the wicked

Wisdom: قَدِّمِ الِاخْتِبَارَ فِي اتِّخَاذِ الْإِخْوَانِ فَإِنَّ الِاخْتِبَارَ مِعْمَارٌ يُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ وَالْأَشْرَارِ
enWisdom: Be sure to investigate before taking anyone as your brother, for assessment is the gauge that distinguishes the virtuous from the wicked
Accompanying a person [for some time] is sufficient to evaluate him

Wisdom: مَنِ اتَّخَذَ أَخاً بَعْدَ حُسْنِ الِاخْتِبَارِ دَامَتْ صُحْبَتُهُ وَتَأَكَّدَتْ مَوَدَّتُهُ
enWisdom: One who takes a brother after successfully evaluating him, his companionship will last longer and his bond will be more firmly established

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُقَدِّمْ فِي اتِّخَاذِ الْإِخْوَانِ الِاعْتِبَارَ دَفَعَهُ الِاغْتِرَارُ إِلَى صُحْبَةِ الْفُجَّارِ
enWisdom: One who takes a brother after successfully evaluating him, his companionship will last longer and his bond will be more firmly established

Wisdom: مَنِ اتَّخَذَ أَخاً مِنْ غَيْرِ اخْتِبَارٍ أَلْجَأَهُ الِاضْطِرَارُ إِلَى مُرَافَقَةِ الْأَشْرَارِ
enWisdom: One who takes a brother without evaluation will be forced by necessity to associate with the wicked
One who feels at ease [with people] before gauging them, regrets
Do not trust in a friend before testing him

Wisdom: لَا تَأْمَنْ صَدِيقَكَ حَتَّى تَخْتَبِرَهُ وَكُنْ مِنْ عَدُوِّكَ عَلَى أَشَدِّ الْحَذَرِ
enWisdom: Do not rely on your friend until you have tested him, and be extremely cautious of your enemy
